mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into book_classify_detail (book_classify_code, book_classify_detail_code, book_classify_detail_name, sort, remark, create_date, update_date) values (#{bookClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookClassifyDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookClassifyDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update book_classify_detail
book_classify_code = #{bookClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
book_classify_detail_code = #{bookClassifyDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
book_classify_detail_name = #{bookClassifyDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, book_classify_code, book_classify_detail_code, book_classify_detail_name, sort, remark, create_date, update_date from book_classify_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, book_classify_code, book_classify_detail_code, book_classify_detail_name, sort, remark, create_date, update_date from book_classify_detail
book_classify_code like "%" #{bookClassifyCode} "%"
and book_classify_detail_code like "%" #{bookClassifyDetailCode}"%"
and book_classify_detail_name like "%" #{bookClassifyDetailName}"%"
order by id asc

select id, book_classify_code, book_classify_detail_code, book_classify_detail_name, sort, remark, create_date, update_date from book_classify_detail where book_classify_detail_code = #{bookClassifyDetailCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, book_classify_code, book_classify_detail_code, book_classify_detail_name, sort, remark, create_date, update_date from book_classify_detail where book_classify_detail_name = #{bookClassifyDetailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
